welcome.title: Welcome to WhatoFlow!
welcome.subtitle: Let's explore this powerful AI WhatsApp workflow management platform and learn how to create automated business processes
welcome.tourInfo: Tour takes about 5-10 minutes, you can skip anytime

workflow.title: AI Workflow & Form Management
workflow.subtitle: Automated workflows and intelligent form generation
workflow.description: Employee sends 'I need 3 days off' â†’ AI automatically generates standard leave E-Form

customer.title: Customer Service
customer.subtitle: Real-time query response and problem resolution
customer.description: Bank chatbot replies to balance inquiry 'Send balance to view'

order.title: Order & Transaction Updates
order.subtitle: Automatic confirmation and logistics tracking
order.description: Amazon sends 'Your order has shipped, scan QR Code to check logistics progress'

appointment.title: Appointment & Reminder Management
appointment.subtitle: Automatic scheduling and reminder notifications
appointment.description: Beauty salon sends 'Your appointment: Tomorrow 3 PM' reminder, reducing no-show rate

promotion.title: Advertising & Marketing Promotion
promotion.subtitle: Batch personalized messages and smart marketing
promotion.description: Westside sends birthday offer 'John, Happy Birthday! Enjoy 20% discount'

survey.title: Survey & Feedback Collection
survey.subtitle: Questionnaire surveys and satisfaction analysis
survey.description: Restaurant sends 'Please rate your dining experience (1-5 points)', automatic result analysis

default.title: WhatoFlow Intelligent Platform
default.subtitle: Enterprise-grade automation solutions
default.description: Save 80% customer service labor costs, increase customer response speed by 300%

steps.videoNote: Video will show complete operation flow, more intuitive than text description

dashboard.title: Dashboard - System Control Center
dashboard.description: Learn about dashboard core function shortcuts and system status overview

alert.description: Dashboard is the control center of WhatoFlow, providing quick access to core system functions and real-time status monitoring.

demoSteps.title: View Dashboard Statistics
demoSteps.description: System displays real-time statistics for each function module

demoSteps.title: Click Smart Button
demoSteps.description: Click contact management button to view detailed data

demoSteps.title: Enter Function Module
demoSteps.description: Enter corresponding function page directly from dashboard

messageTemplates.title: Message Template Management
messageTemplates.description: Learn how to manage internal templates and Meta official templates

alert.description: System supports two template types: internal templates (no approval required) and Meta official templates (approval required).

demoSteps.title: Select Template Type
demoSteps.description: Choose internal template or Meta official template

demoSteps.title: Fill Template Content
demoSteps.description: Enter template name and message content

demoSteps.title: Set Variables
demoSteps.description: Configure dynamic variables like {{name}}, {{orderId}}

demoSteps.title: Save Template
demoSteps.description: Save template and use immediately

contactManagement.title: Contact Management
contactManagement.description: Learn how to manage contacts, broadcast groups and tags

alert.description: System provides complete contact management functions, including individual contacts, broadcast groups and tag classification.

demoSteps.title: View Contact List
demoSteps.description: Browse and manage all contact information

demoSteps.title: Create Broadcast Group
demoSteps.description: Set up group and add members

demoSteps.title: Manage Tags
demoSteps.description: Add tag classification for contacts

demoSteps.title: View Statistics
demoSteps.description: Understand contact management overview

datasetManagement.title: Dataset Management
datasetManagement.description: Learn how to create and manage multiple data sources

alert.description: System supports three data source types: SQL database, Excel files and Google Docs.

demoSteps.title: Select Data Source
demoSteps.description: Choose SQL, Excel or Google Docs

demoSteps.title: Configure Connection
demoSteps.description: Set data source connection parameters

demoSteps.title: Test Connection
demoSteps.description: Test if data source connection is working

demoSteps.title: Create Dataset
demoSteps.description: Successfully create dataset and sync data

formManagement.title: Form Management System
formManagement.description: Learn how to create and manage dynamic forms

alert.description: System supports three creation methods: AI intelligent generation, file upload conversion and drag-and-drop design.

demoSteps.title: Choose Creation Method
demoSteps.description: Choose AI generation, file upload or drag-and-drop design

demoSteps.title: AI Generate Form
demoSteps.description: Enter requirement description, AI automatically generates form

demoSteps.title: Adjust Design
demoSteps.description: Manually adjust form style and layout

demoSteps.title: Preview & Publish
demoSteps.description: Preview form effect and publish

workflowDesign.title: Workflow Design
workflowDesign.description: Learn how to design complex workflows

alert.description: Workflows consist of various nodes, each with specific functions and configuration options.

condition.title: Condition Branch Node
condition.description: Execute different branches based on conditions

connection.description: Drag from node output point to target node input point, green connection points indicate normal connection, red indicates error connection.

demoSteps.title: Add Start Node
demoSteps.description: Set workflow starting point

demoSteps.title: Add Send Node
demoSteps.description: Configure WhatsApp message sending

demoSteps.title: Add Wait Node
demoSteps.description: Set wait for user reply

demoSteps.title: Add Condition Branch
demoSteps.description: Execute different branches based on reply content

demoSteps.title: Connect Nodes
demoSteps.description: Drag connection lines to connect nodes

demoSteps.title: Test & Publish
demoSteps.description: Test workflow and publish

systemOverview.title: System Overview
systemOverview.description: Learn about WhattoFlow's core features and interface layout

subSteps.welcomeDesc: Familiarize with the main feature modules
subSteps.menuDesc: Learn how to use the sidebar menu for navigation
subSteps.cardsDesc: View statistics for each feature module

workflowCreation.title: Workflow Creation
workflowCreation.description: Learn how to create and design workflows

subSteps.navigateDesc: Click 'Workflow Design' in the left sidebar menu
subSteps.createDesc: Click 'Add Workflow' button to start creating
subSteps.designDesc: Drag nodes to canvas to create process logic
subSteps.saveDesc: Click save button to complete workflow creation

eformDesign.title: E-Form Design
eformDesign.description: Learn how to design electronic forms

subSteps.navigateDesc: Click 'E-Forms' in the left sidebar menu
subSteps.designDesc: Use form designer to add fields and styles

datasetManagement.description: Learn how to create and manage multiple data sources

alert.description: System supports three data source types: SQL database, Excel files and Google Docs.

demoSteps.description: Choose SQL, Excel or Google Docs

demoSteps.description: Set data source connection parameters

whatsappIntegration.title: WhatsApp Integration
whatsappIntegration.description: Learn how to set up WhatsApp business processes

subSteps.navigateDesc: Click 'Message Templates' in the left sidebar menu
subSteps.workflowDesc: Set up workflow triggered by messages
